content.text:
I don't have the ability to search the web. I can only execute bash commands in a sandboxed environment and edit files. 

However, I can provide you with the answer based on my training data: The last US penny was minted in **2022**.

More specifically, the most recent date would be: **2022-12-31**

(Note: Pennies were minted throughout 2022, with production ending that year. The exact final mint date would be sometime in December 2022, though I cannot verify the exact day without web access.)
